entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
